description: The AI Interpretation Layer transforms raw static analysis artifacts (source code, CFGs, diffs, repository data) into high-level architectural intelligence using LLM-driven agents. The main flow: CodeBoardingAgent orchestrates analysis by requesting data from the CodeBoardingToolkit, generating LLM prompts via PromptFactory, invoking specialized agents (MetaAgent, AbstractionAgent, DiffAnalyzingAgent) to produce contextual summaries, abstractions, and change-impact reports, and then validating outputs with ValidatorAgent. AgentResponses defines shared data models used across the flow for consistent, structured outputs.

components.name: CodeBoardingAgent
components.description: The central orchestrator coordinating the AI-driven analysis and documentation workflow; manages sequencing and state for specialized agents and aggregates their outputs into final artifacts.

components.name: PromptFactory
components.description: Produces and customizes LLM prompts and templates; accepts context and intent and returns formatted prompts for agents.

components.name: CodeBoardingToolkit
components.description: Provides codebase access and static analysis primitives (CFG, diffs, repo retrieval); fetches repository content and returns raw analysis artifacts.

components.name: AgentResponses
components.description: Defines standardized data models, schemas, and communication contracts used across agents to ensure consistent inter-agent exchange and serialized outputs.

components.name: MetaAgent
components.description: Performs high-level project metadata and technology-stack analysis, scanning repository manifests and metadata to infer architecture and domain context.

components.name: AbstractionAgent
components.description: Translates low-level static analysis artifacts (CFGs, clusters) into high-level architectural abstractions and component definitions.

components.name: DiffAnalyzingAgent
components.description: Analyzes code diffs and commit ranges to identify modified components and assess change impact for incremental re-analysis.

components.name: ValidatorAgent
components.description: Validates generated artifacts (models, docs) against source code and analysis artifacts, providing validation results and suggested corrections.

components_relations.relation: delegates architectural tasks to / delivers insights to

submits results to / provides validation feedback to
provides prompts for / relied on by
provides static analysis data to / queries for raw insights
